## Tasks

- [ ] Create unit tests
- [ ] Document usage in [`filters/README.md`](https://github.com/ashur/eleventy-toolkit/blob/main/src/filters/README.md)
- [ ] Update [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/ashur/eleventy-toolkit/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
